item.title: Carrie add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "When considering the truth of a proposition, one is either engaged in an honest appraisal of the evidence and logical arguments, or one isn't. Religion is one area of our lives where people imagine that some other standard of intellectual integrity applies." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "The fact that my continuous and public rejection of Christianity does not worry me in the least should suggest to you just how inadequate I think your reasons for being a Christian are." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Carrie add a quote by Enigma
item.description: "If you understand or if you don't If you believe or if you doubt There's a universal justice And the eyes of truth Are always watching you" -- Enigma
